headline.main: Review: The New York Philharmonic Plays a Piece Inspired by Night
headline.print_headline: The Goddess of Night Is Also a Muse

lead_paragraph: Institutional investors anxious not to be left out of this year's marquee initial public offering helped Snap Inc pull off the biggest U.S.-listed technology share sale this week since Chinese e-commerce juggernaut Alibaba Group Holding Inc smashed records in 2014.
